EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Copper plate mine at position(-24, -44)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (-24, -44)
- Burner mining drill at position (-23, -44)
- Burner mining drill at position (-22, -44)
- Burner mining drill at position (-24, -43)
- Burner mining drill at position (-23, -43)
- Burner mining drill at position (-22, -43)

###Electricity generator at position(-3, -44)
Consists of steam engine at position (-3, -44), boiler at position (-5, -44) and offshore pump at position (-7, -44)

###Iron plate mine at position(-13, -50)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (-13, -50) and a burner-inserter at position (-13, -49)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

NAMESPACE
